ComicInfo.Summary: Dinner at Eight: Samaritan and Winged Victory go on a date, but end up discussing business. Samaritan tells how he came to the present from the future to prevent the space shuttle disaster in 1986, but when he returned to his time, it had changed and he no longer existed there. Winged Victory grows frustrated with the differences between her and Samaritan, but they come to an understanding and seal it with a kiss before heading back to work.
ComicInfo.Title: Dinner at Eight
ComicInfo.Penciller: Alex Ross,Brent Eric Anderson,Brent Anderson,Brent Anderson
ComicInfo.Inker: Alex Ross,Brent Eric Anderson,Brent Anderson,Brent Anderson
